CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 22, 1967, pg. 18, reads: "AUBA Association Nets $106,000 - A smile of victory is reflected in faces of officers and members of the Allegheny Union Baptist Association, who recently closed what has been termed the most progressive year in its history. According to the moderator, Rev. Brannon J. Hopson, front row center, a total of $106,339.12 was raised this year, including grants from various sources.  This announcement in the moderator's report at the 15th Annual Session at Mt. Calvary Baptist Church, New Kensington, brought a wave of enthusiastic applause from the body, many of whom surround him in this picture.  To name a few officers, first row, left to right, Mrs. H. S. Cuff, Mrs. C. W. Torrey, Rev. J. A. Williams, Mrs. Williams, Mrs. Bessie R. Hairston, Mrs. I. B. Lavigne, Mrs. Hopson, Rev. Hopson, Rev. H. H. Gaines, Mrs. Catherine Graham, AUBA Auxiliary president; Mrs. Ethelda King, Mrs. Carrie Ellis, Mrs. Marie L. Williams, Rev. V. I. Perry, Mrs. Elvira Marks, Mrs. LeDora Goggins, Mrs. Rowena Cook, and Mrs. Ruth West.  Second row, Revs. C. W. Torrey, H. B. French, G. L. Bowick and B. H. Logan.  Among the key men of the area cloistered about the pulpit are the Revs. James B. Cayce, state president; Porter W. Phillips and E. D. Davis. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of officers and members of Allegheny Union Baptist Association, including first row from left: Mrs. H. S. Cuff, Mrs. C. W. Torrey, Rev. J. A. Williams, Mrs. Williams, Bessie R. Hairston, Mrs. I. B. Lavigne, Mrs. Hopson, Rev. Hopson, Rev. H. H. Gaines, Catherine Graham, Ethelda King, Carrie Ellis, Marie L. Williams, Rev. V. I. Perry, Elvira Marks, LeDora Goggins, Rowena Cook, Ruth West; second row includes: Revs. C. W. Torrey, H. B. French, G. L. Bowick, B. H. Logan, and the Revs. James B. Cayce, Porter W. Phillips and E. D. Davis, in Mt. Calvary Baptist Church, New Kensington, another version
